short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to analyse ingredients to check if product is UPF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPF Ingredient Analyser is your go-to tool for checking the ingredients in food products to identify potentially ultra-processed ingredients. This extension helps you evaluate food contents for commonly found additives, colorings, and processed components that might contribute to ultra-processed food.

Simply paste a list of ingredients and this extension will tell you if any UPF ingredients are found.
